main.description: Copy a single emoji from another repo. Requires auth.

source.description: The handle or DID of the repo to copy from.

renameTo.description: The alias to save the Bluemoji to in the current logged-in user's repo.

errors.name: EmojiNotFound
errors.description: Indicates the named Bluemoji was not found in the source repo.

errors.name: DestinationExists
errors.description: Indicates another Bluemoji with the same name already exists in the source repo. Set renameTo to rename.
